title: Drawing, "Pool in the Woods", 1874
medium: Brush and black wash, traces of graphite on white wove paper.
markings: Verso: Stamped in center: Cooper Union Museum New York
signed: Signed in graphite, lower left: W.T. Richards; initialed and dated in  brush ? and wash,lower right: WTR July [?] 1874
provenance: Gift of the National Academy of Design
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Woodland scene with two tall trees at lower right arching over stream that meanders from foreground to waterfall in the right distance. Other trees occupy middle to distant plane at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Pool in the Woods", 1874.
1874. Brush and black wash, traces of graphite on white wove paper.. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-63.
